info.title: Orca Public API
info.description: A list of public endpoints for Orca protocol

chain.description: Chain to use (solana for mainnet, eclipse for eclipse chain)

get.summary: Get locked liquidity for a given whirlpool
get.description: This endpoint returns the locked liquidity for a given whirlpool.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The Solana account address of the whirlpool.

get.summary: List whirlpools with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort whirlpools by

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Direction to sort whirlpools in

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Cursor to start the next page of results

parameters.name: previous
parameters.description: Cursor to start the previous page of results

parameters.name: hasRewards
parameters.description: Filter whirlpools that must have rewards

parameters.name: hasWarning
parameters.description: Filter whirlpools that must have a warning

parameters.name: hasAdaptiveFee
parameters.description: Whether a whirlpool must be using adaptive fee

parameters.name: isWavebreak
parameters.description: Whether a whirlpool must have graduated from wavebreak

parameters.name: minTvl
parameters.description: Minimum TVL of a whirlpool in USDC

parameters.name: minVolume
parameters.description: Minimum volume of a whirlpool in USDC

parameters.name: minLockedLiquidityPercent
parameters.description: Minimum locked liquidity percentage of a whirlpool

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of results to return

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Filter whirlpools containing this token

parameters.name: tokensBothOf
parameters.description: Filter whirlpools containing both specified tokens

parameters.name: addresses
parameters.description: Filter whirlpools with these addresses

parameters.name: stats
parameters.description: Filter whirlpools with stats for these time periods

parameters.name: includeBlocked
parameters.description: Include blocked whirlpools if true

get.summary: Search for whirlpools by token symbols or address
get.description:
This endpoint allows searching for whirlpools by:
- Token symbols (e.g., "SOL USDC" to find pools with both tokens)
- Single token symbol (e.g., "SOL" to find all pools containing SOL)
- Whirlpool address (single address exact match)

The search is case-insensitive and supports partial matching for token symbols.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query text to search by

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Cursor to start the next page of results

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction

parameters.name: minTvl
parameters.description: Minimum TVL of a whirlpool in USDC

parameters.name: minVolume
parameters.description: Minimum volume of a whirlpool in USDC

parameters.name: stats
parameters.description: Filter whirlpools with stats for these time periods

parameters.name: userTokens
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of token addresses owned by the user

parameters.name: hasRewards
parameters.description: Filter for pools with rewards

parameters.name: verifiedOnly
parameters.description: Filter for pools with verified tokens

parameters.name: hasLockedLiquidity
parameters.description: Filter for pools with locked liquidity

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Whirlpool address

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort whirlpools by

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Direction to sort whirlpools in

parameters.name: next

get.summary: Recent protocol stats for the Orca
get.description:
This endpoint returns general information about the Orca protocol including:
- Total Value Locked (TVL) in USDC
- 24-hour trading volume in USDC
- 24-hour fees collected in USDC
- 24-hour protocol revenue in USDC

This endpoint returns detailed information about the Orca token, including:
- Token symbol, name, and description
- Token image URL
- Current price in USDC
- Circulating and total supply
- 24-hour trading volume statistics

The circulating supply is calculated as the total supply minus tokens held in excluded addresses
(treasury, grants, etc.). The data is cached to reduce RPC and database load.

get.summary: Circulating supply of the Orca protocol's token
get.description:
This endpoint returns the circulating supply of the protocol's token.
The circulating supply is calculated as the total supply minus the tokens
held in excluded addresses (treasury, grants, etc.).

get.summary: Total supply of the Orca token
get.description:
This endpoint returns the total supply of the protocol's token.
The total supply represents all tokens that have been minted, including those
held in excluded addresses (treasury, grants, etc.).

The response is adjusted for token decimals (6 decimal places) and rounded up
to the nearest whole number.

get.summary: List tokens with pagination and filtering options
get.description: Returns a paginated list of tokens with optional filtering and sorting.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Optional cursor for pagination (next)

parameters.name: previous
parameters.description: Optional cursor for pagination (previous)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Maximum number of tokens to return (default: 50, max: 3000)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by (default: mint_id)

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction (default: asc)

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: Optional filter for specific token addresses

get.summary: Search for tokens by query string
get.description:
Returns a list of tokens that match the query string.
The query string is matched against the token name, symbol, and address.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query text to search by

200.description: List of matching tokens retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get token details by mint address
get.description: Returns detailed information for a specific token identified by its mint address.

parameters.name: mint_address
parameters.description: Token mint address

WhirlpoolRewardInfoExtDb.description:
The actual reward info returned by the db, retaining snake-case field names

Note that we can't make use of `#[serde(flatten)]` here because of some underlying bugs in
how serde handles `rename_all` for flattened struct fields.

Also note that we use [`String`] for the [`Pubkey`] types since the only use for this
struct is to serialize it to a string anyway, so better to take what the db gives us
directly for performance reasons
